groups.name: spring.python.resolver.result
groups.description: Configuration properties for the ResultResolver, responsible for detecting and serializing result expressions within Python scripts.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.result.regex
properties.description: Regular expression pattern used to locate result expressions in Python scripts that should be captured and serialized.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.result.appearance
properties.description: The name of the variable that will hold the JSON-serialized result within the Python script.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.result.position-from-start
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the start of a matched expression before extracting the actual content.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.result.position-from-end
properties.description: Number of characters to skip from the end of a matched expression when extracting its body content.

properties.name: spring.python.resolver.result.printed
properties.description: Determines whether the resolver should automatically print the serialized result back to the output stream.
